<header class="section-header">
<h1 id="faq">Empresas</h1>
</header>

Abaixo você pode conferir as empresas, escritórios e lawtechs que apoiam a ABJ.

<div class="row" style="align:center;">

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results="html", eval=TRUE}
library(magrittr)

obsutils::autenticar_gsheets()
id_pj <- googledrive::as_id("1QpgnN1QaJlZH6zgqviLb0zNCdedW7lBS57EZS11uspg")
da_pj <- googlesheets4::read_sheet(id_pj) %>%
  dplyr::filter(publicar == "s")

montar_div <- function(dados) {
  if (dados$inverter == "s") {
    if (dados$grayscale == "s") {
      st <- "-webkit-filter:grayscale(1) invert(1);filter:grayscale(1) invert(1);max-width: 80%;display:inline-block;"
    } else {
      st <- "-webkit-filter:invert(1);filter:invert(1);max-width: 80%;display:inline-block;"
    }
  } else {
    if (dados$grayscale == "s") {
      st <- "max-width:80%;display:inline-block;-webkit-filter:grayscale(.5);filter:grayscale(.5);"
    } else {
      st <- "max-width:80%;display:inline-block;"
    }
  }
  shiny::a(
    href = dados$site, target="_blank",
    shiny::div(
      class = "col-md-4",
      shiny::span(style = "vertical-align:middle;display:inline-block;height:100%;"),
      shiny::a(
        href = dados$site, target="_blank", 
        shiny::img(src = dados$logo, style = st, alt = dados$empresa)
      ),
      style = "padding-bottom:0px;background-color:#f8f8ff;margin:10px 0px 0px 0px;min-height:200px;"
    )
  )
}


da_pj %>% 
  dplyr::select(-modalidade) %>% 
  dplyr::group_split(empresa) %>% 
  purrr::map(montar_div) %>% 
  shiny::tagList()
```


</div>
